text:
Hi Foodtubers I'm Pauline, I'm a healthy
food blogger from Berlin

and I do a lot of healthy and
plant-based recipes
and today I want to show you how to make a super creamy green smoothie
using avocado and lots of kale
and banana and I hope you like it

So there you go, a very delicious and
creamy

green smoothie, very healthy so if you liked
the video please

give it a thumbs up or leave a comment
below and
if you wanna see more videos, go and subscribe to food tube, it's free

and you can also subscribe to my channel
for healthy and delicious
